div1.p: Rath sends Hench a copy of his letter to Rojas and Cabrera. He looks forward to his visit with them.

Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
I am enclosing a copy of a letter I have just written to
Senora Rojas. I am indeed looking forward to my brief trip to
Havana at the end of the month. You will note that I am planning
to be there two full days. If the situation necessitates it, I
shall be able to stay through Thursday, May 1, leaving Havana
either Thursday night or, at the very latest, Friday morning. I
must be in Providence, Rhode Island, Friday evening.

Needless to say, I shall offer you a full and complete
report sometime during the week of May 5th.
